entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Quispamsis
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Pellets, -2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Ice Pellets
Temperature: -2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -3.8°C
Wind: NNE 41 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain changing to freezing rain near midnight. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with rain changing to rain near noon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Amount 5 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
